xml_element.name: holidays
xml_element.title: Holidays
xml_element.author: $Author: jz $

xml_parent_element.name: config
xml_parent_element.description: The holiday settings for all jobs.

xml_parent_element.name: run_time
xml_parent_element.description: The holiday settings for a job.

xml_child_element.name: weekdays
xml_child_element.description: Specifies days of the week - e.g. Saturday and Sunday - as holidays. Empty elements are specified as child elements.

xml_child_element.name: holiday
xml_child_element.description: This element will be repeated every holiday.

xml_child_element.name: include
xml_child_element.description: Allows the Job Scheduler to use a file containing holiday information. An XML document with the root element is expected. Should the path to the file not be specified absolutely, then the Job Scheduler will assume that the path is relative to the XML configuration file ().

xml_element.description: <holidays> defines the days on which the Job Scheduler should not run a job.

example.pre: <holidays> <holiday date="2004-12-24"/> <holiday date="2004-12-25"/> <holiday date="2004-12-26"/> <holiday date="2004-12-31"/> <include file="holidays-2007.xml"/> <include file="holidays-2008.xml"/> </holidays>
